attributes.additional_details:
This government is not standing up to the banks.Who is running the country the government or the banks.If this is the case then we should have a vote of no confidence.
Its cutting all the pensioners heating allowances.
The utility companies are pushing up prices the petrol prices are to high. The rich get richer and the poor get poorer and the jobs get fewer the people on the dole get longer ? We have next to no industry left in the UK.
